1:
"If Yahweh had not been on our side,"\q let Israel say now,
\q
2:
"if it had not been Yahweh who was on our side\q when men rose up against us,
\q
3:
then they would have swallowed us up alive\q when their anger raged against us.


\q
4:
The water would have swept us away;\q the torrent would have overwhelmed us.
\q
5:
Then the raging waters would have drowned us."

\q
6:
Blessed be Yahweh,\q who has not allowed us to be torn by their teeth.
\q
7:
We have escaped like a bird out of the snare of the fowlers;\q the snare has been broken, and we have escaped.


\q
8: Our help is in Yahweh,\q who made heaven and earth.
